details.description: The Energy Department of Bihar invites applications for the position of Assistant Electrical Engineer. Candidates with a degree in Electrical Engineering are eligible to apply.
details.eligibility: Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering from a recognized university.
details.selection_process: Written examination followed by an interview.

details.description: The Energy Department of Bihar is hiring Junior Electrical Engineers. Diploma holders in Electrical Engineering are encouraged to apply.
details.eligibility: Diploma in Electrical Engineering from a recognized institution.
details.selection_process: Written test followed by a personal interview.
